dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Waltz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To amend title 5 of the United States Code to require certain financial disclosures regarding all children of the President and the Vice President, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preventing Assets and Investments with No Transparency from Executive Relatives Act or the PAINTER Act.
Section 13104(e) of title 5, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the header, by striking Spouse or Dependent Child and inserting Spouse, Dependent Child, or Non-Dependent Child;

subparagraph.text: in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), by striking of the reporting individual as follows and inserting the following: of the reporting individual and, if the reporting individual is an individual described in paragraph (1) or (2) of section 13103(f), respecting the non-dependent child of the reporting individual, as follows;
in subparagraph (A), by inserting or non-dependent child after spouse each place it appears;

clause.text: by striking by a spouse or dependent child and inserting by a spouse, dependent child, or non-dependent child; and
by striking by the spouse or dependent child and inserting by the spouse, dependent child, or non-dependent child;
by striking by a spouse or dependent child and inserting by a spouse, dependent child, or non-dependent child; and
by striking of the spouse or dependent child and inserting of the spouse, dependent child, or non-dependent child;
by striking by a spouse or dependent child and inserting by a spouse, dependent child, or non-dependent child; and
by striking of the spouse or dependent child and inserting of the spouse, dependent child, or non-dependent child;

subparagraph.text: in subparagraph (E), by striking the spouse’s or dependent child’s and inserting the spouse’s, dependent child’s, or non-dependent child’s;

clause.text: by striking of spouses and dependent children and inserting of spouses, dependent children, and non-dependent children; and
by striking of the spouse or dependent children and inserting of the spouse, dependent children, or non-dependent children; and

subparagraph.text: in the matter following subparagraph (F), by striking to the spouse and dependent child and inserting to the spouse, dependent child, and non-dependent child; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

In this subsection, the term non-dependent child means any individual who is a son, daughter, stepson, or stepdaughter of the reporting individual that is over the age of 17 and that is not a dependent child of such reporting individual.
